message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,500. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to stay within my budget.

Bob, I understand you're working within a budget, but $11,500 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit more. How about $13,000? This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to come down, but $13,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $12,200. This is my final offer, so I hope we can meet in the middle.
